message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm not quite ready to meet you there. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?

I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit far from what I'm comfortable paying. Would you be willing to meet me at $112? I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I don't want to go too far above my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. I'm getting closer to my minimum price, but I still need to make a bit more. How about we meet at $118? I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $112. Would you be willing to meet me at $114? I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I don't want to go too far above my budget.

I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but I need to be honest with you, I'm not sure how much more I'm willing to budge. If you're really interested in the product, I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $116?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $114. Would you be willing to meet me at $114.50? I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I don't want to go too far above my budget.
